  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>"

```{r setup}
library(visR)
```

```{r}
library(survival)
library(magrittr)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(broom)
library(patchwork)
fit <- survfit(Surv(time, status) ~ sex, data = lung) 
a <- fit %>% 
  tidy() %>% 
  visr_plot_surv()
a
```


Display risk table
```{r}
b <- visr_plot_risk(fit, 500) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = time, y = strata, label = n.risk)) + 
  geom_text() 
b
```


```{r}
a / b
```
